actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Commerce, Trade and Consumer Protection.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Commerce, Trade and Consumer Protection

official_title: To prohibit the manufacture, sale, or distribution in commerce of any consumer product containing dimethylfumarate.

summary.text: DMF Free Act of 2009 - Makes it unlawful for any person to manufacture for sale, offer for sale, or distribute in commerce any consumer product containing dimethylfumarate (DMF). Treats any consumer product containing DMF as a banned hazardous substance under the Federal Hazardous Substance Act and treats a violation of this Act as a violation of the Consumer Product Safety Act.

titles.title: To prohibit the manufacture, sale, or distribution in commerce of any consumer product containing dimethylfumarate.
